bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of ju 疽 , impediment-illness, and lou 瘺 , fistula, or of impediment-illness that opens to fester and develops into a fistula. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry yang lu mu 楊櫨木：主疽瘺惡瘡，水煮葉汁洗瘡，立差 , “It controls impediment-illness with fistula and malign sores. When the sores are washed with the liquid obtained from boiling the leaves with water, this will bring an immediate cure”.
